ui.dialog.login.title: Login form
ui.dialog.login.passwordfield.label: Password
ui.dialog.login.userfield.label: Email address
ui.dialog.login.registernewuserbutton.to: Click this button to register a new user

validation.email: Field {attribute} is not a proper email address

ui.tour.loginuser.step1: Add your email address here. This is the address we will use when we need to contact you.
ui.tour.loginuser.step2: Add a new password here, easy to remember, hard to figure out. At least 10 character long.
ui.tour.loginuser.step3: If you don't have a user already, click this button to add a password confirmation field, to register a new user.
ui.tour.loginuser.step4: Finally, click this button to create a new user or login with your email address and password.
